snippet.title: This War of Mine: The Little Ones - Launch Trailer "Super Dad" [UK]
snippet.description:
Available Now!

This War Of Mine: The Little Ones provides an experience of war not from an elite soldier´s point of view but from the perspective of a group of civilians that are trying to survive. Struggling with a lack of food, limited or no medical supplies and under the threat of constant danger from the world around, players will need to make life-or-death decisions just to make it through another day. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thiswarofmine/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThisWarOfMine
http://tlo.thiswarofmine.com/
